title: Mobile QBs and DBs who can catch
description:
Jalen & Jacoby tackle a great slate of games, and Jalen's theme of the weekend was simple: QB's who make plays, and DBs who can catch. It showed up again and again, starting with the biggest matchup of the weekend: Bills-Chiefs. Buffalo won what might end up being the AFC title game, behind a big performance from Josh Allen and Stefon Diggs, and a defense that got to Mahomes in the backfield and in the air. Plus! Huge upsets by the Giants, Jets, and the Steelers. Oh, and the Warriors gave their young guards a bag! Tap in. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
